description: A Solution object for passing parameters to Jhonny

affected_flows.description: All the flows that are affected by implementing the Solution.

solution_flows.description: The specific flow(s) on which the Solution is implemented. This is the flow that the Solution directly modifies.

solution.description: The signed change on the solution_flows. This is the amount by which the solution_flows are modified. Note that this is not a ratio or percent, but the amount in units.

flow_to_remove.description: The flow that is removed by the Solution when shifting a flow.

target_vertex.description: The target vertex of the new flow. The source of the flow remains the same as of flow_to_remove.

ratio.description: A modifier ratio that should be applied to the new flow in order to account for missing flows.
